verses.content: Chu naw khawm chu LALPA chun Job chu a dawn a, a hril tah a:
“Iengkimthawthei kaltu chun ama ân chûktir ding am a nih? Pathien sêlkaltu chun dawn raw se,” tiin.
Chun, Job chun LALPA chu a dawn a, a hril tah a,
“Ngai ta, kei iengkhawplo hin ieng tin am dawn ka ti che a? Ka kutin ka bau hup el ka tih.
Vawi khat thu ka hril tah a, dawn chu dawn naw ning; Anih, vawi hni, amiruokchu, hril pei naw ning,” tiin.
Chun, LALPA chun Job chu thlivira chun a hung dawn a, a hril tah a,
“Pasal angin tuhin i dier kei la, Nang chu indawn ka ti che a, mi hril rawh;
Nang ngei khawma ka rorêl hi i ngaitha ding am a nih? Thiem i chang theina dingin, kei chu thiemnaw i mîn changtir ding maw?
Annawleh, Pathien angin bân i nei am a nih? Ama ang chun râwlriin i sukrûm thei am a nih?
Tuhin ṭha famkimna le insângnain inbel la, Ropuina le inzâumnain inthuom bawk rawh.
I lunginsen sip liemhai chu bunthla la, Mi a chapo taphawt chu en la, ngaihnuoi la,
Mi a chapo taphawt chu en la, siehnuoi rawh; Chun, mi rilo chu an ngîrnaa chun sir thlu rawh.
Pilvuta chun anni chu thup tâwl la, An hmaihai chu hmun inthupa chun inkhum rawh.
Chun, kei khawma i kut changtieng chun Nangma a sandam thei che a nih ti hrieng ka tih.
“Ngai ta, tuhin tuisamak nanga anga ka siem chun, Sebâwngchal angin hlobet a fâk a nih.
Ngai ta, tuhin a hrâtna chu a kâwngahai chun a um a, A tha chu a phing tisaahai chun a um a nih.
Sidar thing angin a mei chu a hêm a, A êlpui thahruihai chu ân têl khâwm a nih.
A ruhai chu dârsen theikhuonghai ang a na, A kut le kehai chu thîr tluonhai ang an nih.
Pathien siemhaia lal chu a na, Ama siemtu chau chun a thal chu ama kuomah a pêk thei a.
Matheiloin, tlânghai chun bu an hung insuopêk a, Ramsahai po po inhnelna hmun ngeihai chun.
Tuihna buk hnuoiahai chun a zâl a, Phairuong buk hnuoi dûma chun.
Tuihna kûnghai chun an hlimin an inkhum a, Vadungte phahrâmhai chun ama a tuom bawk a.
Ngai ta, vadung chu hung lien sien khawm, ân thin ngai nawh a. Jordan chu a bau chenin hung lien sien khawm ân ringzo a nih.
Ân vêng zing lai chun miin an lâk ding am a nih? Annawleh, a hnâr dâwn chu chângin an âwk ding am a nih?
